1.content: Choose the Code Geass girl you wish to start off with.
1.title: Pick your girl

11.content: Which ways doe C.C. wanting to gain weight?
11.title: C.C.

choices: Go to school and bug Lelouch
She is still hungry order more pizza
Lelouch comes back after school to discuss what to do next
111.content: C.C. was bored; she was stuck at Lelouch’s house while he was at school. The only consultation that she had was the ability to order anything she liked for delivery. She had come to discover and love pizza as it was a new experience for her. She had just finished a large pepperoni pizza hut pizza. Her love for pizza along with the lack of physical activity over the last week due to her being deemed a weapon by Britannia showed as the scale said she had gained 5 pounds though it did not bother her and was hardly noticeable. “Well now that I have had lunch what should I do next.”
111.title: The Beginning

choices: 5 medium pizzas, all of them with pepperoni
1112.content: Though she already had pizza, she could not get the thought of it out of her head. She was also still hungry, so she decided to order more pizza to snack on. Luckily for her, she had a punchcard, which meant that on her 10th purchase, she would get free pizza--and just her luck! She was down to her last punch on the card, which meant that she could buy as much pizza as she wanted! Just thinking about it made her drool, so she called to order more pizza, and was stunned when she opened the door and received--
1112.title: More Pizza...

11121.content: "Wow..." C.C. could only say this one word at the sight of the giant, XXL pizza. She opened the box, and what she saw inside was like gold to her. It was a HUGE, 24" pizza with pepperoni galore. She just couldn't handle it, the thought of tasting the warm, fresh pizza slipped her mind and she began to chow down.Slice, after slice, the pizza disappeared as C.C. ate it, until the box was completely empty! As C.C. laid down and let the pizza digest, there was a knock at the door. It was--
11121.title: The Pizza of Queens!

111211.content:
Lelouch came walking through the door, carrying a few bags of groceries in his hands. When he locked his eyes on C.C., he was somewhat stunned at the sight of her big belly and the pizza boxes scattered around. "C.C., what've you been doing since I've been gone?"

"Mmm... Pizza..." C.C. was laying on the couch after her feast, rubbing her belly. "That was so good. You should've had some, too." Lelouch tried not to look at C.C.'s belly, but failed, and was somewhat intrigued by her. "Well, you look satisfied. But perhaps you want more food?"

"Hmmm..." C.C. thought to herself and said--
111211.title: Lelouch's Aid

info.brief_description: Code Geass girls start to gain weight and you choose how.
info.description:
I am sick and tired of seeing stories of the same series like naruto and pokemon. I say its time for something different. I have yet to see any decent Code Geass WG writing so lets see what you got.

There are only a few rules
no male wight gain
no gay/lesbian is fine though
sex is aloud
put effort into your chapters
go wild anything else goes
have fun and enjoy!
